content: this was a design that was inspired by the beginning crochet class i used to teach i made this as an example of what can be done with the 3 most basic of crochet stitches single_crochet double_crochet and the chain stitch hugs n kisses otherwise known as x s & o s that is sometimes used in letters and notes to denote a hug o and a kiss x this pattern is made up of alternating row of double_crochet cross stitches x s and double_crochet with ch1 spaces o s rating easy materials ~lily s sugar and cream 100% cotton worsted weight in cream a light blue b and delft blue c 1 ball each for tri-colour or 1 ball of cream for single colour or colours of your choice ~size g hook ~tapestry needle also at interweave 1 1 http //www interweave com/article/crochet/hugs-n-kisses-dishcloth/
